comments.comment: Adoration & Praise , God's Attributes , Peace & Hope

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've heard a thousand stories
Of what they think You're like
But I've heard the tender whisper
Of love in the dead of night
And You tell me that You're pleased
And that I'm never a lone

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You're a good, good Father
It's who You are, it's who You are
It's who You are
And I'm loved by You
It's who I am, it's who I am
It's who I am

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh and I've seen many searching for
Answers far and wide
But I know we're all searching for answers only You provide
Because You know just what we need
Before we say a word

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh this Love so undeniable
I, I can hardly speak Peace so unexplainable
I, I can hardly think
As You call me, deeper still
As You call me deeper still
As You call me deeper still
Into love, love, love

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
You're a good, good Father
It's who You are, it's who You are
It's who You are
And I'm loved by You
It's who I am, it's who I am
It's who I am

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
You are perfect in all of Your ways
You are perfect in all of Your ways
